alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 3:42PM AKDT until November 04 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occuring with periods of low visibility. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Periods of blowing snow could reduce visibility to near blizzard conditions at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northwest winds are causing snow squalls, that will cause visibility to become very low at times. Winds will decrease Friday afternoon and conditions will improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
